thread.section_title: WholeLatteLove.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of WholeLatteLove.com | www.wholelattelove.com | 4 of 44
thread.title: J. W.

author: J. W.
title: J. W.
text: Customer service for my multiple transactions have been great, and have been satisfied with all of my purchases. My only reservation is that when multiple people respond to your emails to customer service, some of the details of your issue might get lost in the shuffle. Also, there should be a separate process for gift returns as opposed to regular returns. Other than that, everything was great, and the customer service staff were very friendly and responsive.
